definitions.text: characterized by directness in manner or speech; without subtlety or evasion
examples: I gave them my candid opinion
a forthright approach to the problem
tell me what you think--and you may just as well be frank
it is possible to be outspoken without being rude

definitions.text: directly and without evasion; not roundabout
examples: the responsibility lies squarely with them
spoke forthright (or forthrightly) and to the point
